mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into admin_user (userName, userEmail, creat_time, update_time, userType, userCode, userPassword) values (#{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creat_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{update_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{userType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update admin_user set userName = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, userEmail = #{userEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, creat_time = #{creat_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{update_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, userType = #{userType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, userCode = #{userCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, userPassword = #{userPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, userName, userEmail, creat_time, update_time, userType, userCode, userPassword from admin_user
select * from admin_user where userCode='${userCode}' and userPassword='${userPassword}'
select userName from admin_user where id=${AdminId}
